commits.subject: Merge pull request #34 from devmade-ai/claude/verify-preview-constraints-Pace8
commits.body: Fix export text wrapping mismatch with preview
commits.title: Merge pull request #34 from devmade-ai/claude/verify-preview-constraints-Pace8

commits.subject: Update docs for Media tab Image Cell/Overlay and Layout tab alignment
commits.body:
- USER_GUIDE.md: Added Image Cell and Image Overlay sections to Media tab,
  updated Layout tab to show context-aware Text Alignment behavior
- TESTING_GUIDE.md: Added M6 (Image Cell), M7 (Image Overlay) tests,
  updated L3-L5 for new section/cell/global alignment selection,
  expanded regression checklist
commits.title: Update docs for Media tab Image Cell/Overlay and Layout tab alignment

commits.subject: Update documentation for session changes
commits.body:
- SESSION_NOTES.md: Updated with export fixes and UI improvements
- HISTORY.md: Added 2026-01-18 section with all changes
- CLAUDE.md: Updated Media Tab and Layout Tab descriptions
commits.title: Update documentation for session changes

commits.subject: Fix Image Overlay to use global overlay system (same as templates)
commits.body:
- Changed from per-cell overlay (cellOverlays) to global overlay (state.overlay)
- Now matches the same system that templates/presets use
- Removed enable toggle - use opacity 0 to disable instead
- Section auto-expands when overlay has opacity > 0
- Templates that set overlay will now be reflected in these controls
commits.title: Fix Image Overlay to use global overlay system (same as templates)

commits.subject: Add Image Overlay section to Media tab
commits.body:
- New collapsible "Image Overlay" section in Media tab
- Controls overlay specifically for the image cell
- Includes:
  - Enable/disable toggle
  - Overlay type (solid, gradients, vignette, spotlight)
  - Color selection (theme colors + neutrals)
  - Opacity slider
- Separate from per-cell overlay in Style tab
- Natural location with other image settings
commits.title: Add Image Overlay section to Media tab

commits.subject: Simplify layout UI: move Image Cell to Media, integrate alignment
commits.body:
- Move Image Cell selector from Layout tab to Media tab (Background Image section)
- Remove separate Cell Assignment section from Layout tab
- Add new Text Alignment section that responds to structure selection:
  - Section selected: applies alignment to all cells in that row/column
  - Cell selected: applies alignment to just that cell
  - Nothing selected: applies global alignment
- Reduces from 3 grids to 1 main structure grid
- Clearer relationship between selection and controls
commits.title: Simplify layout UI: move Image Cell to Media, integrate alignment

commits.subject: Fix cell grid selectors not scaling with row/column count
commits.body:
Changed small size CellGrid from fixed dimensions (80x52px) to
aspect-ratio based sizing like normal/large sizes. Now properly
scales to show all cells regardless of layout structure.
commits.title: Fix cell grid selectors not scaling with row/column count

commits.subject: Add export overlay to show progress to user
commits.body:
- Add isExporting state to App.jsx
- Show "Exporting..." overlay with spinner over canvas during export
- Pass onExportingChange callback to ExportButtons
- Users now see clear feedback instead of canvas disappearing
commits.title: Add export overlay to show progress to user

commits.subject: Hide canvas during export to prevent visible flash
commits.body:
Set opacity to 0 while capturing at full scale, then restore.
This prevents users from seeing the canvas briefly jump to full size.
commits.title: Hide canvas during export to prevent visible flash

commits.subject: Fix export text wrapping mismatch with preview
commits.body:
Remove skipFonts: true from html-to-image export calls.
This option was causing different font metrics during export,
resulting in text wrapping differently than shown in preview.
commits.title: Fix export text wrapping mismatch with preview

commits.subject: Merge pull request #33 from devmade-ai/claude/add-layout-constraints-PLI5N
commits.body: Add dynamic size constraints for layout sections and cells
commits.title: Merge pull request #33 from devmade-ai/claude/add-layout-constraints-PLI5N

commits.subject: Add dynamic size constraints for layout sections and cells
commits.body:
- Add MIN_SIZE (10%) and MAX_SIZE (90%) constants
- Dynamic max based on number of items: 100 - (n-1) * 10
  - 2 items: max 90%
  - 3 items: max 80%
  - 4 items: max 70%
- Prevents any section/cell from going below 10%
- Update slider min/max to reflect dynamic constraints
- Show constraint range in slider labels for clarity
commits.title: Add dynamic size constraints for layout sections and cells

commits.subject: Merge pull request #32 from devmade-ai/claude/review-todo-items-GerLK
commits.body: Remove legacy components and update documentation
commits.title: Merge pull request #32 from devmade-ai/claude/review-todo-items-GerLK

commits.subject: Clarify that AI automatically maintains documentation
commits.title: Clarify that AI automatically maintains documentation

commits.subject: Add 'When to read' to all documentation entries in CLAUDE.md
commits.body:
Standardized all doc entries to include:
- Purpose
- When to read
- When to update
- What to include
- Why
commits.title: Add 'When to read' to all documentation entries in CLAUDE.md

commits.subject: Add user guide and testing guide, update README
commits.body:
Documentation overhaul:
- Create docs/USER_GUIDE.md with tab-by-tab feature documentation
- Create docs/TESTING_GUIDE.md with 20+ manual test scenarios
- Update README.md to reflect current workflow-based UI
- Update CLAUDE.md with USER_GUIDE and TESTING_GUIDE references
- Update HISTORY.md and SESSION_NOTES.md
commits.title: Add user guide and testing guide, update README

commits.subject: Remove legacy components and update documentation
commits.body:
Post-refactor cleanup:
- Delete 6 legacy components replaced by workflow-based UI:
  ImageUploader, TextEditor, LayoutSelector, ThemePicker,
  FontSelector, StylePresetSelector
- Delete REFACTOR_PLAN.md (implementation complete)
- Update CLAUDE.md: remove legacy component references
- Update TODO.md: move cleanup items to HISTORY
- Update HISTORY.md: record cleanup completion
- Update SESSION_NOTES.md: reflect current state
commits.title: Remove legacy components and update documentation

commits.subject: Merge pull request #31 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-text-alignment-reset-3Zhog
commits.body: Add Auto button to reset text alignment to cell default
commits.title: Merge pull request #31 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-text-alignment-reset-3Zhog

commits.subject: Fix text alignment fallback by adding textAlign to defaultTextLayer
commits.body:
The defaultTextLayer was missing textAlign, which could cause issues
with the fallback chain when a text layer was missing or incomplete.
Now explicitly sets textAlign: null to ensure proper fallback behavior.
commits.title: Fix text alignment fallback by adding textAlign to defaultTextLayer

commits.subject: Add Auto button to reset text alignment to cell default
commits.body:
Previously, the only way to reset a per-element text alignment back to
the cell default was a small "×" button that was easy to miss. Now there
is a dedicated "Auto" button (first in the alignment options) with a
faded icon that clearly shows when cell default is being used.
commits.title: Add Auto button to reset text alignment to cell default

commits.subject: Merge pull request #30 from devmade-ai/claude/check-project-status-8mg0y
commits.body: Refactor UI to workflow-based tabs
commits.title: Merge pull request #30 from devmade-ai/claude/check-project-status-8mg0y

commits.subject: Add cleanup tasks and legacy component notes
commits.body:
- TODO.md: Added cleanup section with legacy component deletion tasks
- CLAUDE.md: Updated architecture to show replacement mappings and
  explain why legacy components are kept temporarily
commits.title: Add cleanup tasks and legacy component notes

commits.subject: Refactor UI to workflow-based tabs
commits.body:
Reorganized from feature-based tabs (Image, Layout, Text, Theme, Fonts)
to workflow-based tabs: Templates | Media | Content | Layout | Style

New components:
- CollapsibleSection.jsx - Reusable collapsible section
- TemplatesTab.jsx - Complete designs + layout-only presets
- MediaTab.jsx - Image/logo upload with filters
- ContentTab.jsx - Text editing with cell assignment
- LayoutTab.jsx - Structure + cell alignment
- StyleTab.jsx - Themes, fonts, overlay, spacing

This follows the refactor plan in docs/REFACTOR_PLAN.md
commits.title: Refactor UI to workflow-based tabs

commits.subject: Merge pull request #29 from devmade-ai/claude/refactor-layout-tabs-gjlh9
commits.body: Update CLAUDE.md to accurately reflect current codebase
commits.title: Merge pull request #29 from devmade-ai/claude/refactor-layout-tabs-gjlh9

commits.subject: Add UI refactor plan for workflow-based tabs
commits.body:
Created docs/REFACTOR_PLAN.md with complete plan for:
- New tab structure: Templates → Media → Content → Layout → Style
- Templates as entry point (merged Quick Styles + Layouts)
- Collapsible sections instead of nested sub-tabs
- Content tab owning text placement controls
- Style tab merging Theme + Fonts + Overlay + Spacing
- Implementation order and migration guide

Updated SESSION_NOTES.md with session summary.
commits.title: Add UI refactor plan for workflow-based tabs

commits.subject: Clarify preset naming across documentation
commits.body:
Rename preset types to avoid confusion:
- Layout Presets → "Layouts" (20 grid templates)
- Style Presets → "Quick Styles" (theme + font combinations)
- Theme Presets → "Themes" (color schemes)

Added "Preset Types (Naming Clarification)" table to CLAUDE.md
Added "Quick Styles" section to README.md
Updated all references to use consistent terminology
commits.title: Clarify preset naming across documentation

commits.subject: Update documentation to reflect current state
commits.body:
README.md:
- Update overlay description (8 gradient directions, spotlight, per-cell)
- Add per-element alignment to text features
- Document Layout tab's 5 sub-tabs (Structure, Placement, Overlay, Spacing, Presets)

docs/TODO.md:
- Remove completed item (text placement selector validation)

docs/HISTORY.md:
- Add text placement selector validation entry
commits.title: Update documentation to reflect current state

commits.subject: Update CLAUDE.md to accurately reflect current codebase
commits.body:
- Add Current Tab Structure section (Image, Layout, Text, Theme, Fonts)
- Fix Layout sub-tabs order to match code (Structure, Placement, Overlay, Spacing, Presets)
- Update Architecture with all actual components (StylePresetSelector, ErrorBoundary, useDarkMode)
- Correct component descriptions to match implementation
commits.title: Update CLAUDE.md to accurately reflect current codebase

commits.subject: Merge pull request #28 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-responsive-placement-hZps4
commits.body: Fix responsive placement selectors and adapt to layout changes
commits.title: Merge pull request #28 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-responsive-placement-hZps4

commits.subject: Update session notes
commits.title: Update session notes

commits.subject: Fix responsive placement selectors and adapt to layout changes
commits.body:
- Add validation to reset text cell assignments when cells are removed
  (switching layout type, removing sections/subdivisions)
- Increase cell selector size from 60x40 to 80x52 for better mobile touch targets
- Slightly increase cell content text size (10px to 11px) for readability
commits.title: Fix responsive placement selectors and adapt to layout changes

commits.subject: Merge pull request #27 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-multiline-inputs-81xM3
commits.body: Fix multiline text display for all text elements
commits.title: Merge pull request #27 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-multiline-inputs-81xM3

commits.subject: Fix multiline text display for all text elements
commits.body:
Only bodyText had whiteSpace: 'pre-wrap' set, causing other text
elements (title, tagline, bodyHeading, cta, footnote) to collapse
newlines into spaces. Now all text inputs properly display multiline
content.
commits.title: Fix multiline text display for all text elements

commits.subject: Merge pull request #26 from devmade-ai/claude/alignment-cell-vs-text-wH2ET
commits.body: Add per-text-element horizontal alignment
commits.title: Merge pull request #26 from devmade-ai/claude/alignment-cell-vs-text-wH2ET

commits.subject: Make all text inputs multiline for flexibility
commits.title: Make all text inputs multiline for flexibility

commits.subject: Add alignment controls to Text tab
commits.body:
Now users can set horizontal alignment from both:
- Text tab (alongside color, size, style, spacing)
- Layout > Placement tab (with cell context)

Both control the same state property (text[element].textAlign)
commits.title: Add alignment controls to Text tab

commits.subject: Add per-text-element horizontal alignment
commits.body:
Changes alignment from cell-level to text-level for horizontal alignment:
- Each text element (title, tagline, etc.) can now have its own textAlign
- Alignment fallback chain: element → cell → global
- Keeps vertical alignment at cell level (appropriate for layout positioning)

Use case: centered headline with left-aligned body text in same cell

Changes:
- useAdState.js: Add textAlign/textVerticalAlign to each text group
- AdCanvas.jsx: Apply per-element alignment via alignSelf + textAlign
- LayoutSelector.jsx: Add alignment buttons per text element in Placement tab
- CLAUDE.md: Document new alignment architecture
commits.title: Add per-text-element horizontal alignment

commits.subject: Merge pull request #25 from devmade-ai/claude/add-overlay-options-RdHFw
commits.body: Add expanded overlay options for better layout support
commits.title: Merge pull request #25 from devmade-ai/claude/add-overlay-options-RdHFw

commits.subject: Enable overlay stacking: global + cell overlays layer together
commits.body:
- Global overlay (Image tab) always applies to image cells
- Cell overlay (Layout > Overlay) stacks on top as additional layer
- Allows combining effects like vignette + gradient for rich visuals
- getCellOverlay no longer falls back to global (handled separately)
- Fixed non-image cell check for enabled: false
commits.title: Enable overlay stacking: global + cell overlays layer together

commits.subject: Fix per-cell overlay not applying to image cells
commits.body:
The renderImage function was hardcoded to use the global overlay,
ignoring per-cell overlay settings. Now it accepts an overlay config
parameter that respects cell-level overrides for both:
- Multi-cell layouts (rows/columns with image cells)
- Fullbleed layouts (single cell 0)
commits.title: Fix per-cell overlay not applying to image cells

commits.subject: Update CLAUDE.md with expanded overlay options
commits.title: Update CLAUDE.md with expanded overlay options

commits.subject: Add expanded overlay options for better layout support
commits.body:
- Add horizontal gradients (left/right) for side-by-side column layouts
- Add diagonal gradients (4 corners) for corner-based compositions
- Add spotlight effect (inverse vignette) for center-focused content
- Update overlay button labels with arrow icons for clarity
- Update grid layout to 4 columns for better fit with 12 overlay types
- Add contextual tips for all new overlay types
commits.title: Add expanded overlay options for better layout support

commits.body: Improve style presets with neutral color text defaults

commits.subject: Improve style presets with neutral color text defaults
commits.body:
- Add textColors support to style preset settings for per-element color control
- Update applyStylePreset to apply text colors when selecting a preset
- Improve all existing presets with carefully chosen neutral text colors:
  - Dark backgrounds use white/off-white titles, light-gray body, gray footnotes
  - Light backgrounds use off-black titles, dark-gray body, gray footnotes
- Add 8 new presets: Midnight Blue, Pure Monochrome, Champagne Glow,
  Terracotta Warmth, Fresh Mint, Lavender Dream, Vintage Cream, Feature Grid
- Add 2 High Contrast presets: Stark Contrast, Inverted Bold
- Add new "High Contrast" category
- Update overlay colors to use neutrals for more consistent results

Total: 24 style presets across 9 categories, each with complete text color definitions.
commits.title: Improve style presets with neutral color text defaults

commits.subject: Add preset-based color schemes for improved text overlay defaults
commits.body:
- Add overlay and textColors to all 20 layout presets
- Hero/fullbleed presets: off-black overlay (40%) + white text
- Split layouts: no overlay + theme-adaptive secondary text
- Update applyLayoutPreset() to apply colors with layout
- Set initial state to hero defaults for better out-of-box experience

Split color and size controls onto separate rows in TextEditor.
Restructured text element rows in LayoutSelector Placement tab
to put color picker on its own row with flex-wrap for mobile.

commits.subject: Add neutral colors for text and overlays
commits.body:
Add 6 neutral color options (off-black, dark gray, gray, light gray,
off-white, white) available in all color pickers regardless of theme.

- Define neutralColors array and getNeutralColor() helper in themes.js
- Update TextEditor, ImageUploader, and LayoutSelector color pickers
- Update AdCanvas resolveColor() to handle neutral color keys
commits.title: Add neutral colors for text and overlays

commits.subject: Improve grayscale control with slider and preset independence
commits.body:
- Change grayscale from boolean to percentage (0-100%)
- Add quick toggle in Settings section (On/Off)
- Add fine-tune slider in Filters section (0-100%)
- Presets no longer override user's grayscale setting
- Update all preset configs to use numeric values

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Improve grayscale control with slider and preset independence

commits.subject: Add horizontal position control for images
commits.body:
- Change imagePosition from string to object with vertical/horizontal
- Add horizontal position control (left, center, right) in Image tab
- Combine both values for CSS background-position

Useful for controlling which part of image is visible when cropped in cover mode.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Add horizontal position control for images

Tips appear in Image tab (Filters + Overlay sections) and Layout → Overlay tab,

commits.body: Add Inter as the UI font

commits.subject: Add dark mode with toggle and system preference detection
commits.body:
- Enable darkMode: 'class' in Tailwind config
- Create useDarkMode hook with localStorage persistence and system preference fallback
- Add dark mode toggle button in header (sun/moon icons)
- Update index.css with dark backgrounds, scrollbar, and range input styles
- Apply dark: variants to all UI components:
  - App.jsx (header, sidebar, preview area, tabs)
  - PlatformPreview, ExportButtons, StylePresetSelector
  - FontSelector, TextEditor, ImageUploader (all sections)
- Keep ad canvas preview neutral (shows true ad appearance)
commits.title: Add dark mode with toggle and system preference detection

commits.subject: Add Inter as the UI font
commits.body:
- Load Inter from Google Fonts with preconnect for performance
- Set as default sans-serif in Tailwind config with system font fallbacks
- Weights: 400, 500, 600, 700 for UI flexibility
commits.title: Add Inter as the UI font

commits.subject: Merge pull request #17 from devmade-ai/claude/ui-progressive-disclosure-colors-aPVYO
commits.body: Consolidate accent colors to blue-only palette
commits.title: Merge pull request #17 from devmade-ai/claude/ui-progressive-disclosure-colors-aPVYO

commits.subject: Consolidate accent colors to blue-only palette
commits.body:
Replaced purple and amber accent colors with blue throughout the UI
for a more cohesive, professional look. Color system now uses:
- Blue: primary actions, selection states, active UI
- Green: visibility/enabled states (semantic)
- Red: destructive actions and errors (semantic)

Changes:
- LayoutSelector: purple→blue for structure editing, cell selection
- LayoutSelector: amber→blue for text group assignments
- ImageUploader: amber→red for error messages (semantic correction)
commits.title: Consolidate accent colors to blue-only palette

commits.subject: Merge pull request #16 from devmade-ai/claude/improve-app-design-OHXzc
commits.body: Improve overall app visual design and polish
commits.title: Merge pull request #16 from devmade-ai/claude/improve-app-design-OHXzc

commits.subject: Improve overall app visual design and polish
commits.body:
- Increase text sizes for better readability (text-xs -> text-sm)
- Add consistent rounded corners (rounded-lg -> rounded-xl)
- Improve spacing with more breathing room between elements
- Add soft shadows and depth to panels and cards
- Update button styles with better hover/active states
- Add smooth transitions for interactive elements
- Style range inputs with custom track and thumb
- Add custom scrollbar styling
- Use subtle gradients for backgrounds
- Make header sticky with backdrop blur
- Add progress bar animation for export
- Consistent styling across all components

All changes maintain mobile-friendliness with responsive sizing.
commits.title: Improve overall app visual design and polish

commits.subject: Fix undo/redo for add/remove row operations
commits.body:
addSection and removeSection were mutating existing objects instead of
creating new ones, corrupting the undo history. Now uses .map() with
spread operator to ensure immutability.

Also added high-priority TODO for text placement selector updates.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix undo/redo for add/remove row operations

commits.subject: Show active sub-tab name as Layout section header
commits.body:
Since Layout sub-tabs now use icon-only buttons, dynamically display
the active sub-tab name (Structure, Placement, Overlay, Spacing, Presets)
instead of static "Layout" header for better clarity.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Show active sub-tab name as Layout section header

commits.subject: Fix style presets using old textGroups format
commits.body:
Style presets were using textGroups format but applyStylePreset
looked for textCells. Converted all 16 style presets to textCells
format so text cell assignments now apply correctly.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix style presets using old textGroups format

commits.subject: Replace Layout sub-tab text labels with SVG icons
commits.body:
Tabs were too narrow for text labels like "Placement" and "Structure".
Now uses custom SVG icons with hover tooltips for a cleaner, more compact UI.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Replace Layout sub-tab text labels with SVG icons

- CLAUDE.md: Detailed guidance for each doc (what, when, why)
- README.md: Rewritten as user-facing guide with features and how-to

commits.subject: Remove max-height from left sidebar card
commits.body:
Let card fit to content on both mobile and desktop for consistent behavior

commits.title: Remove max-height from left sidebar card

commits.subject: Fix left sidebar card not stretching to full height
commits.body:
Change flex items-start to items-stretch so columns match height

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix left sidebar card not stretching to full height

commits.subject: Style left sidebar as card and increase width
commits.body:
- Convert sidebar from plain background to card styling (rounded, border, shadow)
- Increase width from 320px to 384px on desktop
- Make card stretch to fill available height with internal scrolling

commits.body:
Increase padding and gaps for better visual breathing room, add fade
gradient on mobile to hint at scrollable overflow tabs.

commits.body:
- Reorder Layout subtabs: Structure, Placement, Overlay, Spacing, Presets

commits.subject: Restore layout presets and placement tab features
commits.body:
- Fix layout presets: convert textGroups to textCells format
- Restore Presets tab with category filters (All, Suggested, etc.)
- Restore per-cell alignment controls in Placement tab
- Restore text element visibility toggle and color picker

commits.title: Restore layout presets and placement tab features

commits.subject: Fix cells container not expanding in small grids
commits.body:
The cells container was missing flex-1 when showSectionLabels was false,
causing it to collapse to zero width in the Placement tab grids.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix cells container not expanding in small grids

commits.subject: Update CLAUDE.md title
commits.body: Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Update CLAUDE.md title

commits.subject: Fix cell grid rendering for fullbleed and small sizes
commits.body:
- Normalize structure to single cell when layout type is fullbleed
- Use fixed dimensions (60x40px) for small grids instead of flexible sizing
- Prevents grid collapse in flex containers on Placement tab

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix cell grid rendering for fullbleed and small sizes

commits.subject: Merge pull request #15 from devmade-ai/claude/revert-cell-alignment-LcSMq
commits.body: Revert per-group alignment to cell-level alignment
commits.title: Merge pull request #15 from devmade-ai/claude/revert-cell-alignment-LcSMq

commits.subject: Fix cell grid display for fullbleed and small sizes
commits.body:
- Add minHeight to size configurations to ensure grid visibility
- Change flex from '0 0 X%' to '1 1 X%' to allow cells to grow
- Add min-h-[20px] to cells and h-full to container
- Reduce small grid maxWidth to 60px for better inline fit
commits.title: Fix cell grid display for fullbleed and small sizes

commits.subject: Add per-element text cell placement with consistent UI
commits.body:
- Changed from grouped text placement (titleGroup, bodyGroup) to
  individual element placement (title, tagline, bodyHeading, etc.)
- Each text element can be assigned to any cell independently
- Simplified Placement tab with clean row layout matching image placement
- All text within a cell shares alignment (prevents overlapping)
- State renamed from textGroups to textCells with flat structure
commits.title: Add per-element text cell placement with consistent UI

commits.subject: Revert per-group alignment to cell-level alignment
commits.body:
Per-group alignment caused text elements to overlap because each group
was rendered in its own absolutely positioned container. This change
reverts to cell-level alignment where all text groups in a cell share
a single alignment container, allowing text to flow naturally.

- Simplified textGroups state to only store cell assignment (no alignment)
- Removed per-group alignment controls from Placement tab
- Updated AdCanvas to render all groups in single container per cell
commits.title: Revert per-group alignment to cell-level alignment

commits.subject: Merge pull request #14 from devmade-ai/claude/text-element-selectors-7j8r1
commits.body: Add per-group cell selectors and alignment in Placement tab
commits.title: Merge pull request #14 from devmade-ai/claude/text-element-selectors-7j8r1

commits.subject: Add clear documentation requirements and update docs for current session
commits.body:
- Add Documentation section to CLAUDE.md with table defining docs, purpose, and when to update
- Update Key State Structure to reflect textGroups with per-group alignment
- Update Layout Tab Sub-tabs section (removed Alignment, added Overlay/Spacing/updated Placement)
- Mark completed features in TODO.md (per-group placement, unified grid, fullbleed as single-cell)
- Update SESSION_NOTES.md with documentation changes
commits.title: Add clear documentation requirements and update docs for current session

commits.subject: Unify cell grid components and remove fullbleed special-casing
commits.body:
- Create UnifiedCellGrid component replacing CellGrid and StructureGrid
- Supports modes: structure, image, textGroup, cell
- Section labels (R1/R2, C1/C2) only shown in Structure tab
- Treat fullbleed as single-cell grid for consistent UI
- All Layout sub-tabs now work the same for all layout types
commits.title: Unify cell grid components and remove fullbleed special-casing

commits.subject: Add per-group cell selectors and alignment in Placement tab
commits.body:
- Each text group (Title+Tagline, Body, CTA, Footnote) now has its own
  cell selector grid and alignment controls
- Alignment is per-group with fallback to global settings
- Amber color indicates custom alignment, blue indicates using global
- Removed Style Presets section from Image tab
- Updated AdCanvas to render each group with its own alignment container
commits.title: Add per-group cell selectors and alignment in Placement tab

commits.subject: Merge pull request #13 from devmade-ai/claude/add-layout-presets-Faxjc
commits.body: Add global style presets for one-click professional looks
commits.title: Merge pull request #13 from devmade-ai/claude/add-layout-presets-Faxjc

commits.subject: Enlarge and center cell selector grids in Layout tabs
commits.body:
- Add size prop to CellGrid and StructureGrid (normal=180px, large=280px)
- Apply size="large" to main cell selectors in Structure, Placement, Overlay, and Spacing tabs
- Center grids with flex justify-center containers
- Center labels to match
- Keep small size for inline image cell selector in Placement tab
commits.title: Enlarge and center cell selector grids in Layout tabs

commits.subject: Add global style presets for one-click professional looks
commits.body:
Style presets combine layout, theme, fonts, overlay, and image filters
into cohesive design packages. This replaces the layout-only presets
with comprehensive styling that users can apply with a single click.

- Add 16 style presets across 7 categories (Modern, Professional, Elegant, Warm, Fresh, Retro, Grid)
- Create StylePresetSelector component at top of preview area
- Remove Presets sub-tab from Layout (now handled by global presets)
- Add applyStylePreset function to useAdState hook
- Track active preset ID to highlight selected style
commits.title: Add global style presets for one-click professional looks

commits.subject: Merge pull request #12 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-select-cell-display-dOy0G
commits.body: Add consistent cell selector to Placement tab
commits.title: Merge pull request #12 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-select-cell-display-dOy0G

commits.subject: Align Structure tab UI with other layout sub-tabs
commits.body:
- Update StructureGrid to use dynamic aspectRatio prop (matches CellGrid)
- Add consistent "Select Cell" label format
- Add selection indicator matching Placement/Overlay/Spacing tabs
- Use platformAspectRatio for consistent grid sizing across all tabs
commits.title: Align Structure tab UI with other layout sub-tabs

commits.subject: Add consistent cell selector to Placement tab
commits.body:
Restore the "Select Cell" display with selection indicator to the
Placement tab, matching the pattern used in Overlay and Spacing tabs
for UI consistency across layout sub-tabs.
commits.title: Add consistent cell selector to Placement tab

commits.subject: Merge pull request #11 from devmade-ai/claude/cleanup-todos-ZlUa9
commits.body: Clean up TODO.md - mark implemented items, simplify scope
commits.title: Merge pull request #11 from devmade-ai/claude/cleanup-todos-ZlUa9

commits.subject: Optimize re-renders with React.memo
commits.body:
Wrap components with memo to prevent unnecessary re-renders:
- ThemePicker + ColorInput
- FontSelector
- PlatformPreview
- TextEditor
- ImageUploader
- ExportButtons

These components now only re-render when their props actually change.
commits.title: Optimize re-renders with React.memo

commits.subject: Add error boundaries for graceful error handling
commits.body:
- Create reusable ErrorBoundary component with friendly UI
- Wrap all major sections: Image, Text, Layout, Theme, Fonts
- Wrap AdCanvas preview and ExportButtons
- Each boundary shows contextual error message with retry button
- Errors are logged to console for debugging
commits.title: Add error boundaries for graceful error handling

commits.subject: Change padding from percentage to fixed px units
commits.body:
- Default padding now 20px instead of 5%
- Slider range 0-60px with 4px steps
- Consistent padding regardless of cell size
- Updated useAdState, AdCanvas, and LayoutSelector
commits.title: Change padding from percentage to fixed px units

commits.subject: Add typography controls: bold, italic, and letter spacing
commits.body:
- Add bold/italic toggle buttons for each text element
- Add letter spacing options (Tight, Normal, Wide, Wider)
- Update default state with new typography properties
- AdCanvas now renders fontWeight, fontStyle, and letterSpacing dynamically
- Title, Body Heading, and CTA default to bold for visual hierarchy
commits.title: Add typography controls: bold, italic, and letter spacing

commits.subject: Overhaul Image tab UX - cleaner flow and collapsible sections
commits.body:
- Reorganize section order: Upload → Remove → Settings → Effects → Logo
- Add collapsible Section component with sensible defaults
  - Settings: open by default
  - Style Presets, Filters, Overlay: collapsed by default
  - Logo: collapsed unless logo exists
- Move Remove button immediately after upload area (was buried after Quick Layout)
- Remove Quick Layout presets from Image tab (belongs in Layout tab)
- Remove unused layout-related props from ImageUploader
- Clean up imports (removed layout preset dependencies)
commits.title: Overhaul Image tab UX - cleaner flow and collapsible sections

commits.subject: Clean up TODO.md - mark implemented items, simplify scope
commits.body:
- Mark completed: smart layout suggestions, keyboard shortcuts, export loading states
- Remove advanced text customization items (keeping only bold/italic/letter-spacing)
- Clarify Image tab UX issues as priority item with clear problem description
- Consolidate completed features, remove duplicates
commits.title: Clean up TODO.md - mark implemented items, simplify scope

commits.body: Add Image tab improvements to TODO list
commits.title: Merge pull request #10 from devmade-ai/claude/improve-todo-layout-CKPEx

commits.subject: Implement Phase 4 placement tab enhancements
commits.body:
Placement tab now features:
- Image section with cell selector + quick controls:
  - Cover/Contain toggle
  - Grayscale on/off
  - Overlay opacity slider
- Individual text elements (not groups):
  - Title, Tagline, Body Heading, Body Text, CTA, Footnote
  - Each with visibility toggle, color picker, text input
  - Cell placement buttons (when multi-cell layout)
- Text alignment controls (horizontal + vertical)
commits.title: Implement Phase 4 placement tab enhancements

commits.subject: Implement Phase 3 UX polish
commits.body:
- Standard alignment icons: SVG-based left/center/right and top/middle/bottom
- Sub-tabs more prominent: larger text, bolder styling, blue active state
- Cell selector improvements:
  - Constrained max-width (180px) on wider screens
  - Matches selected platform aspect ratio
  - Simple numbered labels (1, 2, 3) instead of Row/Column naming
commits.title: Implement Phase 3 UX polish

commits.subject: Implement Phase 2 tab simplifications
commits.body:
Text Tab:
- Remove sub-tabs (Content, Style, Placement)
- Combine content input with inline style controls (color, size)
- Simpler, single-view editing experience

Layout Tab:
- Merge Alignment + Placement + Image Position into unified "Placement" tab
- Remove separate Align tab (was redundant)
- Placement tab now shows: image position, text alignment, text group placement
- Removed duplicate image position from Presets tab
- Reduced from 6 sub-tabs to 5
commits.title: Implement Phase 2 tab simplifications

commits.subject: Implement Phase 1 UX improvements
commits.body:
- Rename "Media" tab to "Image" for clarity
- Default platform to Instagram Square (most common use case)
- Reorder platforms: IG Square, TikTok, LinkedIn, IG Story first
- Default presets filter to "All" instead of "Suggested"
- Remove layout "Type" selector from presets tab (unnecessary complexity)
commits.title: Implement Phase 1 UX improvements

commits.subject: Add cell selector aspect ratio matching to TODO
commits.body: Cell selector should match selected platform's shape for consistency
commits.title: Add cell selector aspect ratio matching to TODO

commits.subject: Add Text tab simplification and Placement enhancements to TODO
commits.body:
- Text tab: remove sub-tabs, simplify to single view
- Layout tab: make sub-tabs more prominent
- Placement: separate individual text elements (not groups)
- Placement: per-element color and text editing
- Placement: image quick controls (contain/cover, grayscale, overlay)
commits.title: Add Text tab simplification and Placement enhancements to TODO

commits.subject: Add Layout tab UX improvements to TODO list
commits.body:
- Remove type from presets, default to All
- Consolidate placement tabs (image + text)
- Merge alignments and placements
- Use standard alignment icons
- Better cell assignment UX (confusing dropdown names)
- Improve cell references (row/column not user-friendly)
- Smaller cell selector on wide screens
- Fixed units for padding instead of percentages
commits.title: Add Layout tab UX improvements to TODO list

commits.subject: Add Image tab improvements to TODO list
commits.body:
- Rename Media tab to Image
- Default platform to Instagram Square
- Reorder platforms (IG Square, TikTok, LinkedIn, IG Story first)
- Better quick layout suggestions
- More logical section ordering
- Collapsible sections
- Fix remove image placement

Features:

commits.body: Redesign Layout tab with sub-tabs and unified cell selector
commits.title: Merge pull request #8 from devmade-ai/claude/improve-layout-tab-74Et0

commits.subject: Add Text tab sub-tabs, expand themes, and update documentation
commits.body:
Text Tab Improvements:
- Split into 3 sub-tabs: Content, Style, Placement
- Content: text inputs with visibility toggles
- Style: color and size controls per layer
- Placement: assign text groups to layout cells

Theme System:
- Expanded from 4 to 12 preset themes
- Added: Corporate, Slate, Sunset, Ocean, Forest, Earth, Neon, Candy

Documentation:
- Reorganized TODO.md with clear sections
- Added planned features: image presets, per-cell overlays, padding controls
- Added ideas: merge Logo/Image tabs, sample images
commits.title: Add Text tab sub-tabs, expand themes, and update documentation

commits.subject: Make preview canvas responsive and update documentation
commits.body:
- Preview canvas now adapts to container width using ResizeObserver
- Fills available horizontal space while maintaining aspect ratio
- Respects max height (60% viewport or 600px) to prevent overflow

Documentation updates:
- CLAUDE.md: Updated architecture, state structure, and added Layout Tab section
- SESSION_NOTES.md: Documented all session changes
- TODO.md: Added Layout Tab sub-tabs section, marked responsive preview complete
commits.title: Make preview canvas responsive and update documentation

commits.subject: Improve Structure sub-tab with contextual cell/section selection
commits.body:
- Add StructureGrid component with clickable section labels (R1, R2... or C1, C2...)
- Click section label to edit row/column: height/width slider + subdivision count
- Click cell in subdivided section to edit that cell's width/height
- Click same element again to deselect (toggle behavior)
- Shows only relevant control for current selection:
  - Section selected: height/width + split count + delete option
  - Cell selected: width/height + "Edit Parent" button
  - Nothing selected: overview + "Add Row/Column" button
- Purple highlighting for selected elements, lighter purple for sibling cells
- Cells show their size percentage when subdivided
commits.title: Improve Structure sub-tab with contextual cell/section selection

commits.subject: Redesign Layout tab with sub-tabs and unified cell selector
commits.body:
- Add sub-tabs: Presets, Structure, Alignment, Placement
- Create reusable CellGrid component for consistent cell selection
- Presets tab: quick layout type + preset selection with image position
- Structure tab: fine-tune rows/columns, sizes, subdivisions
- Alignment tab: click cell to edit (none = all cells), H/V alignment
- Placement tab: click cell then assign text groups with quick buttons
- Purple highlight for selected editing cell, blue for image cell
- Reduces visual clutter by organizing controls by purpose
commits.title: Redesign Layout tab with sub-tabs and unified cell selector

commits.subject: Merge pull request #7 from devmade-ai/claude/new-layout-framework-OVqiZ
commits.body: Enhance layout controls with quick presets and improved UX
commits.title: Merge pull request #7 from devmade-ai/claude/new-layout-framework-OVqiZ

commits.subject: Enhance layout controls with quick presets and improved UX
commits.body:
- Add quick layout preset picker to Image tab showing suggested layouts
- Allow up to 3 subdivisions per section (was limited to 2)
- Implement proportional auto-balancing when adjusting section sizes
- Default preset category to "Suggested" instead of "All"
- Add +/- controls for subdivision count with visual feedback
commits.title: Enhance layout controls with quick presets and improved UX

commits.subject: Merge pull request #6 from devmade-ai/claude/evaluate-grid-layout-4GX3n
commits.body: Implement nested grid layout system with resizable cells
commits.title: Merge pull request #6 from devmade-ai/claude/evaluate-grid-layout-4GX3n

commits.subject: Implement nested grid layout system with resizable cells
commits.body:
Replace the old row/column split system with a new nested grid approach:
- Primary split (rows or columns) with optional subdivisions per section
- Each section has customizable size percentages
- Image goes in a single cell (no spanning complexity)
- Visual cell picker in UI shows layout structure clearly

New features:
- Add/remove sections dynamically
- Toggle subdivisions per section (split button)
- Resize sections and subdivisions with sliders
- New "Grid" category with 4 preset layouts using nested cells
- Click-to-select image cell in visual preview

Breaking change: Layout state structure changed from splitType/sections/imageCells
to type/structure/imageCell format.
commits.title: Implement nested grid layout system with resizable cells

commits.subject: Merge pull request #5 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-github-actions-deploy-W7p1T
commits.body: Fix GitHub Actions deployment timeout issues
commits.title: Merge pull request #5 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-github-actions-deploy-W7p1T

commits.subject: Fix GitHub Actions deployment timeout issues
commits.body:
- Update concurrency group to be ref-specific
- Add timeout-minutes to deploy job (10 min)
- Add timeout-minutes to deploy step (5 min)
- This prevents deployments from getting stuck in queued state
commits.title: Fix GitHub Actions deployment timeout issues

commits.subject: Enhance layout system with expanded presets and improved UX
commits.body:
- Expand layout presets from 6 to 17 (hero variants, two-thirds splits,
  accent strips, banners, center focus, image sandwich)
- Add visual SVG preview icons replacing Unicode symbols
- Organize presets into categories (All, Suggested, Image Focus,
  Text Focus, Balanced) with tab navigation
- Implement smart layout suggestions based on image aspect ratio
  and platform type
- Add quick actions: Flip (swap sides), Rotate (columns <-> rows),
  Reset (default layout)
- Improve preset naming for clarity
- Collapse fine-tune controls by default for cleaner UI
commits.title: Enhance layout system with expanded presets and improved UX

- Add keyboard shortcuts: Ctrl+Z (undo), Ctrl+Shift+Z / Ctrl+Y (redo)
- Skip history when typing in inputs to preserve native behavior

commits.subject: Fix export capturing scaled preview instead of full-size canvas
commits.body:
The canvas uses CSS transform scale for preview display, but html-to-image
was capturing the scaled-down version. Now temporarily sets scale(1) during
capture to export at correct dimensions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix export capturing scaled preview instead of full-size canvas

commits.subject: Fix text layer state errors and Google Fonts export issue
commits.body:
Add defensive checks to prevent crashes when text layer state is
undefined (can happen during hot reload). Skip font embedding in
html-to-image export to avoid cross-origin stylesheet errors with
Google Fonts.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Fix text layer state errors and Google Fonts export issue

commits.subject: Add overlay to all layouts and expand text layers
commits.body:
- Fix overlay to apply to images in all layout types (background, vertical, horizontal)
- Expand text layers from 3 to 6: title, tagline, body heading, body text, call to action, footnote
- Update documentation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Add overlay to all layouts and expand text layers

commits.subject: Add Social Ad Creator implementation
commits.body:
- Vite + React 18 + Tailwind CSS setup
- Image upload with drag-drop, object-fit and position controls
- 16 layout templates (background, vertical columns, horizontal rows)
- Text layers: title, subtitle, body with visibility and color controls
- 4 overlay types: solid, gradient down/up, vignette
- Theme system with 4 presets + custom colors
- 5 Google Fonts for title and body text
- Export to 6 platforms: LinkedIn, Facebook, Instagram, Twitter/X, TikTok
- Single download and batch ZIP download
- GitHub Pages deployment configured

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
commits.title: Add Social Ad Creator implementation
